nodes.text:
The Degathem was a BFF-1 bulk freighter used by the Galactic Empire during the "Arms Race". The Degathem and the Anterab were delivering supplies critical for
the development of the TIE Defender starfighter. Despite rebel attempts
to end the phase by raiding the Imperial research station, both ships completed their
mission and delivered the supplies.
Degathem is an anagram of Megadeth.
